Comments_List:
Strengths- small size so discussion was robust and interesting, the material is super relevant, Professor is good at facilitating discussion, the readings are good.
Weaknesses- the class only meets once a week so we have to fit a lot of material into each class.
I would definitely recommend this course. I would always look forward to learning an incredible amount on Friday mornings.
